description: Curated test articles for span detection validation and quality testing

usage.quick_test: Use high_manipulation IDs for fast quality checks
usage.full_test: Use articles from each category for comprehensive testing
usage.regression: Run all IDs after prompt changes to catch regressions

high_manipulation.description: Tabloid articles with 10+ spans expected. Good for testing detection coverage.

editorial_voice.description: Articles with editorial commentary, opinion-style language. Tests editorial_voice category.

clean.description: Factual articles with minimal manipulation. 0-2 spans expected. Wire services, straight news.

quoted_speech.description: Articles with extensive direct quotes. Tests quote filtering - spans inside quotes should be filtered.
quoted_speech.expected_spans: Varies - quoted phrases should NOT be flagged

urgency_inflation.description: Articles with BREAKING, urgent language, crisis framing. Tests urgency_inflation category.

clickbait_headlines.description: Articles with clickbait titles but moderate body. Tests title span detection.

long_form.description: Articles over 8000 characters. Known limitation - may have incomplete span detection.
long_form.expected_spans: May be incomplete - tests chunking edge case

sports_hype.description: Sports articles with hype language. Tests sports/event hype category.

notes.adding_articles: Add article UUIDs as you encounter good test cases during development
notes.updating: Update the 'updated' field when adding new IDs
